payload.description: Optional. The AppConnection event payload. Unset for deletion events.

AppConnectionEventData.title: App Connection Event Data
AppConnectionEventData.description: The data within all AppConnection events.

name.description: Required. Unique resource name of the AppConnection. The name is ignored when creating a AppConnection.

createTime.description: Output only. Timestamp when the resource was created.

updateTime.description: Output only. Timestamp when the resource was last modified.

labels.description: Optional. Resource labels to represent user provided metadata.

displayName.description: Optional. An arbitrary user-provided name for the AppConnection. Cannot exceed 64 characters.

uid.description: Output only. A unique identifier for the instance generated by the system.

type.title: Type
type.description: Enum containing list of all possible network connectivity options supported by BeyondCorp AppConnection.

applicationEndpoint.description: Required. Address of the remote application endpoint for the BeyondCorp AppConnection.

connectors.description: Optional. List of [google.cloud.beyondcorp.v1main.Connector.name] that are authorised to be associated with this AppConnection.

state.title: State
state.description: Represents the different states of a AppConnection.

gateway.description: Optional. Gateway used by the AppConnection.

AppConnection.title: App Connection
AppConnection.description: A BeyondCorp AppConnection resource represents a BeyondCorp protected AppConnection to a remote application. It creates all the necessary GCP components needed for creating a BeyondCorp protected AppConnection. Multiple connectors can be authorised for a single AppConnection.

host.description: Required. Hostname or IP address of the remote application endpoint.

port.description: Required. Port of the remote application endpoint.

ApplicationEndpoint.title: Application Endpoint
ApplicationEndpoint.description: ApplicationEndpoint represents a remote application endpoint.

type.title: Type
type.description: Enum listing possible gateway hosting options.

uri.description: Output only. Server-defined URI for this resource.

ingressPort.description: Output only. Ingress port reserved on the gateways for this AppConnection, if not specified or zero, the default port is 19443.

appGateway.description: Required. AppGateway name in following format: `projects/{project_id}/locations/{location_id}/appgateways/{gateway_id}`

l7psc.description: Output only. L7 private service connection for this resource.

Gateway.title: Gateway
Gateway.description: Gateway represents a user facing component that serves as an entrance to enable connectivity.
